ColumnsWizard.GlobalDescConvTab.message: Choose here which additional columns you want to see in the Conversation Tab.

ColumnsWizard.GlobalDescCustCols.message: Choose here which custom columns you want to add to the messages list.

ColumnsWizard.WarnDescCustCols.message: Once selected, you need to show the column in the folder view where you need it. You'll have to do this again if you delesect and reselect a previously selected option.

ColumnsWizard.InfoMainDesc.message: This addon is free and developed in my spare time. If you're using it in your every day routine, feel free to support it with a little donation clicking on the link below. Thanks!!

ColumnsWizard.CustomHeadersDescCustCols.message: * This column will be populated only for mails that will be received after the Custom Column activation.

ColumnsWizard.NewFolderCols.label.message: Use your default columns setup for new folders.

ColumnsWizard.NewFolderCols.Desc.message: This is the columns' default configuration for the new folders. You can modify it here or use the menu in the column picker of the message list.

ColumnsWizard.CustCols.mod_active_checkb.message: This option will be automatically checked if a custom column is saved with the editing option enabled.

ColumnsWizard.MailHeader.use_imap_fix_ch.message: Force changes when using IMAP accounts.

ColumnsWizard.MailHeader.put_original_in.message: Put the original message in the Trash folder.

ColumnsWizard.CustCols.use_imap_fix_chec.message: Some IMAP providers (like Gmail) don't register changes in the message source if the main headers are not different from an existing message. To work around this limit, the "Date" field is modified adding a second to the time (or decreasing it if second are 59).

ColumnsWizard.CustCols.put_original_in_t.message: After changing the selected header value, the original message is moved to the trash folder. This is a security measure against any odd behaviour that might happen modifying the headers.
